snippet: The paper will seek new leadership for what it says is a vital part of the newsroom.
abstract: New York Times announces broad revamping of its video unit and will seek new leadership for operation.
lead_paragraph: The paper will seek new leadership for what it says is a vital part of the newsroom.

headline.main: New York Times to Revamp Its Video Unit
headline.print_headline: New York Times Announces Revamping of Its Video Unit
